resources.string: Choose your alert settings. Click the bar/panel for further setting if required
LED Flash\nThe rear LED flashlight will flash on/off when the alarm is active.
Vibration\nVibration alerts will be repeated when the alarm is active if this option is enabled
Screen Flash\nThe screen will change between a series of bright and saturated colours to help you wake up.
Sound\nThis option is for the non-deaf, heavy sleepers. A repeating sound will be played when active.
